name: Lost In Cold
description:
The previous expedition disappeared and you are sent to the north island to uncover the real truth of they disappearance.  

Explore the snowy open-world environment and try to uncover the truth behind strange things happening on this island.

This is visual exploration game where you have no map but you are navigating through the world based on the observing the environment around you, and the more time you spend on the island, the more things you will explore.

WASD - to walk. 

The game is still in development and will be released for free on itch.io and steam, so if you liked the game I would appreciate your donations to help me finish the game.
